item.description:
Thanks to our member Harsh Luthar for setting up this event!

It will be held in the dining hall called Salmonson, which in inside the Unistructure building. The dining hall director is very interested in spreading the word and trying new vegetarian recipes. Because of this, it is required to bring a print out of a recipe you enjoy for him to keep, in addition to the $5.00 fee.

If you cannot find the building, please call Kevin's cell: (401) 573-8912.
item.how_to_find_us: As you drive into Bryant, stop at the public safety booth. The officer there can direct you. Drive straight in and go to the right and park. Try to park as close as possible to the wellness center. The Unistructure is a 5 minute walk.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegetarian Buffet at Bryant University
